name: Art Gallery Rewind
description:
This is our entry for the Brackeys game jam 2020.2. 

Solve puzzle and relive the greatest painting in the history of mankind. 

How to play?

Pieces are moving fast in the treadmill! Use the rotation buttons to rotate the frame to catch them before they hit the wrong spot!

You can also control the mechanical arm to direct where the pieces are falling. 

You can also pause the treadmill and rewind all the pieces if you make a mistake!

Have fun!

Casting:

Produced and Developed by The Star Travellers Entertainment.

"Art Gallery Rewind"

Briefing: Gamejam Brackeys 2020.2

Game Developer: Edmar Souza
Concept & Art Direction: Michelle Karine de Melo

Assets & Vectors: Freepik
